content:
Reinhold Europe AB The Company publishes, in the attachment information on the course
                           of the meeting of the  Extra General Meeting of Shareholders, which took place on
                           28 December 2017.

The Board of Directors of Reinhold Europe Ab_Publ_ informs that the process of finding
                           a new CEO for the company has been delayed.Complite information are attached to the report.

Reinhold Europe AB are hereby invited to the ExtraordinaryGeneral Meeting on 28 December 2017, at 09.00. The meeting will be held at Kommendörsgatan
                           37,in Stockholm. Proposed Agenda are attached to the report.

To better facilitate trading of Reinhold Europe AB's shares, Copernicus has been chosen
                           as a market maker starting 2017-09-01.For information about Copernicus please go to www.copernicusdm.pl.____________________________________________________________________För att underlätta handel med Reinhold Europe ABs aktier har Copernicus valts som
                           market maker från och med 2017-09-01.Mer information om Copernicus finns på www.copernicusdm.pl.
Reinhold Europe will publish the H1 2017 report on 31st of August 2017.

Reinhold Europe AB the Company hereby informs that it received the following information
                           from its shareholders. In attached we are sending announcement to the report.

As part of its strategy to offer property-related products and services, Reinhold
                           Europe AB acquired earlier this year all of the shares in the Swedish car wash chain
                           Waxy International AB. Today, the two companies decided that Waxy's new car wash facility,
                           which is also Scandinavia's largest, will open to the public on January 6, 2018.The facility, located in Smista 15 km south of Stockholm, becomes Scandinavia's largest
                           car wash in abuilding of 3,000 sqm. The new car wash facility has a 60-meter wash tunnel with a
                           capacity of onewashed car per minute and is equipped with technology currently used in more than
                           70 countries.In connection with the opening of the car wash facility in Smista, Waxy launches a
                           brand newBusiness model for car washes in Sweden. The model entitles the customer to pay a
                           fixed monthly feefor free washes. The business model is governed by an automatic payment system that
                           is linked to thevehicle registration plate.The Smista car wash facility has an incredible potential for both private and corporate
                           customers. Now that wehave a set date, we can start with work on marketing and sales.For Reinhold Europe AB it is important to have an opening date for a new car wash
                           facility in such ashort period of time after the acquisition of Waxy.The interest in Waxy International AB has been great since Reinhold Europe AB acquired
                           thecompany and it is good for all parties that we now have a date that our shareholders,
                           employees andpartners can look forward to. Now we can continue to assist Waxys Management with
                           what it takes to keep our common goal for new car wash facilities in Sweden.Reinhold Europe AB goal is for Waxy to operate 225 car wash facilities in the Nordic
                           region within thenext five years, and Waxy's management is currently working on the completion of several
                           contractsfor new car wash facilities in densely populated areas in Sweden. Reinhold Europe
                           AB will keep themarket informed about these developments.

All information about Reinhold Europe AB acquires all shares in Waxy International
                           AB are included in attachment.

Reinhold Europe AB The Company publishes, in the attachment information on the course
                           of the meeting of the Annual General Meeting of Shareholders, which took place on
                           30 June 2017.

Reinhold Europe AB _the Company_ hereby informs that Company’s CEO – Mr. Joakim Karlsson
                           has resigned from his position as of today. Mr.  Karlsson was appointed as CEO to
                           lead the work in restructuring Reinhold and filing the necessary reports including
                           the annual report for 2016. This work has now been completed with great success and
                           this is why Mr. Karlsson steps down as the CEO as of today. The recruiting process
                           for a CEO has start.

Reinhold Europe AB hereby announces that the Annual General Meeting of shareholders
                           will take place on June 30, 2017 at 09:00, on Birger Jarlsgatan 2, 5th floor, in Stockholm.
                           Proposed Agenda are attached to the report.
In attached we are sending notification.

Reinhold Europe AB publ hereby announces that the Annual General Meeting of shareholders
                           will take place on April 10, 2017 at 09:00, Birger Jarlsgatan 2, 5th floor, in Stockholm.
                           Proposed Agenda are attached to the report.The 2015 report, in the English language version, will be published before the Annual
                           General Meeting _convened on April 10, 2017_.

Today the Board of Directors of Reinhold Europe AB appointed Mr. Joakim Karlsson as
                           its new CEO.In attached we are sending CV.

Reinhold Europe AB the Company hereby it obtained the following information from Mr.
                           Harry Rosenberg - Chariman of the board of directors - on the basis of Art. 69 § 1,
                           item 1 of the Act of 29 July 2005 on Public Offering, Conditions Governing the Introduction
                           of Financial Instruments to Organized Trading and Public Companies Dz. U. of 2005
                           . No. 184, item 1539 with later amendments and that pursuant to Art. 19 item 1 Market
                           Abuse Regulation _MAR_.

Reinhold Europe AB publ hereby announces that the Extraordinary General Meeting of
                           shareholders will take place on March 28, 2017 at 09.00 at Birger 2, 5th floor, Stockholm.Proposed Agenda are attached to the report.

Reinhold Europe AB "Spółka" informuje, że Zwyczajne Walne Zgromadzenie Akcjonariuszy
                           Reinhold Europe AB, które odbyło się w dniu 2 marca 2017 roku powołało nowych członków
                           rady dyrektorów zarządu, którymi zostali panowie: Bobby Ernst Mandl i Sven Ingvar
                           Ake Rehbinder. CV nowych członków zarządu zostaną opublikowane w kolejnym raporcie.Reinhold Europe AB The Company informs, that the shareholders of the Company during
                           the AGM which took place on 2nd March 2017 appointed new members of the board of directors:
                           Mr. Bobby Ernst Mandl, and Mr. Sven Ingvar Ake Rehbinder. The CV’s of the new board
                           members will be published in the next report.

Reinhold Europe AB Spółka przekazuje, w załączeniu, informację o przebiegu Zwyczajnego
                           Walnego Zgromadzenia Akcjonariuszy Reinhold Europe AB, które odbyło się w dniu 2 marca
                           2017roku.Reinhold Europe AB The Company publishes, in the attachment information on the course
                           of the meeting of the Annual General Meeting of Shareholders, which took place on
                           2nd March 2017.

Reinhold Europe AB _publ_, announces offer to Reinhold Europe's Shareholders.In accordance with resolutions at the Annual General Meeting and the Board's decision,
                           the Company has published the attached offer to the company's shareholders to acquire
                           the company's subsidiary WXY Holding AB.
Załączniki

Further to the publication of the interim financial report, published November 30,
                           2018, the Board of Reinhold Europe AB encloses the English version of that same report.
In attached we are sending notification.

Reinhold Europe AB the Company hereby informs that it received the following information
                           from its shareholders. In attached we are sending announcement to the report.

The shareholders of Reinhold Europe AB _publ_, are hereby invited to attend the Extraordinary
                           General Meeting on November 15, 2018, at 09.00. The meeting will be held at Kommendörsgatan
                           37, in Stockholm.legal basis: § 19 _1_ _5_ of the Ordinance of the Minister of Finance dated March 29, 2018 on current
                           and periodic information published by issuers of securities and the conditions for
                           regarding as equivalent the information required by the law of a non-member state
                           _i.e. Journal of Laws of 2018, item 757_.
In attached we are sending complete information to the report.

Reinhold Europe AB the Company hereby informs that it received the following information
                           from its shareholders. In attached we are sending announcement to the report.
In attached we are sending notification.

Reinhold Europe AB informs that Waxy International AB _publ_ _WAXY_, wholly owned
                           subsidiary of Reinhold Europe AB announces that the company has taken further steps
                           in building a high quality and environmentally certified chain of car care centres.
                           In attached we are sending complete information to the report.

Reinhold Europe AB the Company hereby informs that it received the following information
                           from its shareholder.In attached we are sending announcement to the report.

Reinhold Europe AB The Company publishes, in the attachment information on the course
                           of the meeting of the General Meeting of Shareholders, which took place on 27 June
                           2018. The meeting declared that the AGM will be adjourned and continue on the 30th of July
                           2018.Legal basis: § 19 _1_ _5_ of the Ordinance of the Minister of Finance dated March 29, 2018 on current
                           and periodic information published by issuers of securities and the conditions for
                           regarding as equivalent the information required by the law of a non-member state
                           _i.e. Journal of Laws of 2018, item 757_.

Reinhold Europe AB The Company publishes, in the attachment information on the course
                           of the meeting of the Annual General Meeting of Shareholders, which took place on
                           June 27, 2018.
In attached we are sending complete information to the report.

Reinhold Europe AB informs that Waxy International AB _WAXY_, wholly owned subsidiary
                           of Reinhold Europe AB  announces that the company has appointed Peter Björklund as
                           its CEO.In attached we are sending complete information to the report.

Reinhold Europe AB _publ_, informerar om att lämna finansiella rapporter vid kommande
                           tillfällen.Reinhold Europe AB _publ_, informs that it will provide financial reports on following
                           future occasions.Publiceringsdatum RapportDate of publikation Report2018-04-30 Årsredovisning /Annual report 20172018-05-31 Kvartal 1 2018/ Interim Q1 report 20182018-08-30 Delårsrapport 2018/ Interim H1 report 20182018-11-30 Kvartalsrapport Q3 / Interim report Q3 2018

Reinhold Europe AB informs that Waxy International AB _publ_ _WAXY_, wholly owned
                           subsidiary of Reinhold Europe AB announces that the company has taken further steps
                           in building a high quality and environmentally certified chain of car care centres.
                           Waxy has signed agreements to open another facility at a very strategic location -
                           the new shopping centre Wasa Handelsplats in Södertälje.In attached we are sending complete information to the report.

Reinhold Europe AB informs that Waxy International AB _publ_ _WAXY_, wholly owned
                           subsidiary of Reinhold Europe AB _publ and Diamond Car Wash of Segeltorp AB _DCW_
                           today have signed a contract for cooperation in Waxy's newly built car care facility
                           in Smista.In attached we are sending complete information to the report.
